<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 19"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[True Perception](/Feats.aspx?ID=2155) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Revelation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=138" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 209 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
legendary in Perception

</column>

---

Your perceptive abilities and ability to process sensory information are so far beyond the pale that you notice minute discrepancies in all sorts of [illusions](/Traits.aspx?ID=92) and [transmutations](/Traits.aspx?ID=157). You are constantly under the effects of a 6th-level [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) spell, using your Perception modifier for the [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check.
name: True Perception
